short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send Direct Messages through FB messenger with a CTA, and auto-respond to all comments!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Respond to all comments on your post with a simple click. Get maximum post exposure and engagement automatically.

Core Posts will begin to automatically respond to all comments on your post strategically leveraging the Facebook Algorithm to get you maximum post exposure and engagement.

It will also send out Direct Messages through Facebook messenger with your CTA link which will keep people commenting on your post to get the link.
